Scalable Brain Atlas.title: Scalable Brain Atlas - Neuroanatomy at your fingertips
Scalable Brain Atlas.description: Home page with an overview of the supported atlas templates and services

Scalable Brain Atlas|Coronal3d.title: Interactive 3d atlas viewer (coronal)
Scalable Brain Atlas|Coronal3d.description: The main atlas viewer, based on 3d display of coronal sections

Scalable Brain Atlas|citation policy.title: Citation policy
Scalable Brain Atlas|citation policy.description: The citation policy is designed to protect those who contribute data to the Scalable Brain Atlas.

Scalable Brain Atlas|credits.title: Credits
Scalable Brain Atlas|credits.description: Lists grant numbers and people who contributed to the Scalable Brain Atlas

Scalable Brain Atlas|hierarchy.title: Complete brain region hierarchy
Scalable Brain Atlas|hierarchy.description: Interactively displays the brain region hierarchy for a given template, including all structures without visible representation in the template

Scalable Brain Atlas|services|distance m.title: Matrix with euclidian distances between region centers within a hemisphere.
Scalable Brain Atlas|services|distance m.description: Returns a table (tab-separated) with the euclidian distances [mm] between region centers within a hemisphere, for a given atlas template

Scalable Brain Atlas|services|label inde.title: Map label indices to region names.
Scalable Brain Atlas|services|label inde.description: Generates a map from label indices to region acronym, full name, or rgb-value.

Scalable Brain Atlas|services|list regio.title: Lists all regions belonging to the given template
Scalable Brain Atlas|services|list regio.description: Returns a table (tab-separated) with all regions contained in a given template, their full names, place in the region hierarchy and whether they are a visible structure in the Scalable Brain Atlas

Scalable Brain Atlas|services|list templ.title: List of supported atlas templates
Scalable Brain Atlas|services|list templ.description: Returns a html-table with all supported atlas templates, including their title and species

Scalable Brain Atlas|services|Matlab ana.title: Analyze atlas templates in Matlab
Scalable Brain Atlas|services|Matlab ana.description: This service lets you download slices and matlab-scripts to your computer, to create advanced 3D visualizations using your local installation of Matlab.

Scalable Brain Atlas|services|neuroVIISA.title: Export brain region contours to neuroVIISAS-compatible XML
Scalable Brain Atlas|services|neuroVIISA.description: neuroVIISAS is a platform for mapping, visualization and analysis of connectivity data from tracing studies

Scalable Brain Atlas|services|neuroVIISA.title: Export brain region hierarchy to neuroVIISAS-compatible XML
Scalable Brain Atlas|services|neuroVIISA.description: neuroVIISAS is a platform for mapping, visualization and analysis of connectivity data from tracing studies

Scalable Brain Atlas|services|region by.title: Find region by coordinate
Scalable Brain Atlas|services|region by.description: This service outputs the name of a brain region, given a stereotaxic coordinate as input.

Scalable Brain Atlas|services|region cen.title: Region centers (optimized for label placement)
Scalable Brain Atlas|services|region cen.description: Returns a table (tab-separated) with columns [acronym | rgb-value | x | y | z], where x (left-right), y (posterior-anterior), z (inferior-superior) are the region centers in [mm] optimized for label placement. They are obtained by peeling of the discretized region volume until a single point remains, see regionCenters_3d.m (download m-files).

Scalable Brain Atlas|services|rgb slice.title: Color-coded PNG (bitmap) or SVG (vector) image of a brain atlas slice
Scalable Brain Atlas|services|rgb slice.description: Returns a color-coded SVG or PNG image of a single brain atlas slice. Get the color scheme from the 'list regions' service. Warning: the PNG image is produced using the RSVG library, which has the shortcoming that anti-aliasing can't be turned off. As a result, border pixels get interpolated RGB values that do not map to a valid brain region.

Scalable Brain Atlas|services|thumbnail.title: Region thumbnail in 2D (slice) or 3D (stack of slices)
Scalable Brain Atlas|services|thumbnail.description: Returns a region thumbnail in 2D (slice), 3D (stack of slices), or both.

Scalable Brain Atlas|services|view\/map.title: View a brain surface in 3D and map values onto brain regions.
Scalable Brain Atlas|services|view\/map.description: Generates an html-embedded X3D scene with controls to map values onto brain regions.

Scalable Brain Atlas|Site map.title: Site map
Scalable Brain Atlas|Site map.description: Displays site map as a hierarchical tree
